remarks.format:
## Remarks Questo convertitore può convertire uno dei seguenti tipi:
- <xref:System.String>
- <xref:System.Decimal>
- <xref:System.Single>
- <xref:System.Double>
- <xref:System.Int16>
- <xref:System.Int32>
- <xref:System.Int64>
- <xref:System.UInt16>
- <xref:System.UInt32>
- <xref:System.UInt64>
- <xref:System.Byte>
